title: Leon Felton
text: Leon Felton (born ) is a Rhodesian/Australian former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 2000s. He played at club level for <a href="Canterbury%20Bulldogs">Canterbury Bulldogs</a>, <a href="St%20Helens%20R.F.C.">St. Helens</a>, <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington Wolves</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Warrington%20Wolves%20players">Heritage № 1020</a>), and <a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a> (<a href="Loan%20%28sports%29">loan</a>), as a , or .
